comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-25D serial 41-30024 "Red Wrath" of the 498th Bomb Squadron, 345th BG. She was photographed here during a low level attack on Boram airfield, 16 October 1943. The aircraft was later transferred to the 500th Bomb Squadron and re-named "Pannell Job" by her pilot, 1LT Ray Pannell.
